#summary Instructions for Developers to Setup ROS with ua-ros-pkg

= Guests =

If you do not have an account on the Google Code site, use these instructions:

  # If the machine has never had ROS installed it, do this first:
{{{
sudo apt-get install build-essential python-yaml cmake subversion
}}}
  # Download the rosinstall file
{{{
wget --no-check-certificate http://ros.org/rosinstall -O ~/rosinstall
}}}
  # Make it executable
{{{
chmod 755 ~/rosinstall
}}}
  # Install ROS!
{{{
~/rosinstall ~/ros http://ua-ros-pkg.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/config/wubble-guest.rosconfig
}}}
